On Sep 17, 2009, at 4:47 PM, Mark Little wrote:

> Bill's been doing a great job of evangelizing REST in the Java world  
> and this effort is meant to compliment that and take it to the next  
> level.

I agree with that (and just for the record, I think quite a few of the  
reactions on this list and elsewhere were way out of line).

Stefan
--Apple-Mail-6-38336597
